timeline.message: Feat(Provider): Begin adding paging support to provider projects custom endpoint
Feat(Provider): Add paging support to provider-projects in the UI
Feat(Provider): Add paging logic in blackduck provider data accessor
Fix(BlackDuck): Compute page count total from elements total and validate paging params
Test(BlackDuck): Add mock for new data accessor method
Fix(BlackDuck): Update back-end paged request to BlackDuck
Fix(UI): Update table select input to be concious of paged input
Fix(UI): Remove commented code for table select input

timeline.bodyText: We don't have to change this in this version of Alert but I think this is a good argument for getting rid of the dynamic endpoints and just create controllers/endpoints as we need. Having to extract the parameters this way is not appealing.
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: Agreed. I think it will be part of a larger effort to rewrite the Jobs UI to have tightly coupled channel endpoints.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Fix(Test): Update mock provider data accessor test to use sub-list for page mocking
Feat(UI): Support searching if allowed by endpoint
Feat(BlackDuck): Add search to provider projects endpoint
